basic.floral_language:
Pachyphytum compactum 
Floriography: perseverance, brave, unique
Has a characteristic appearance and leaves in elongated oval shape, marked by stripes, leaf color pale green to grayish white, has a thin layer of white powdery. In a cool season with adequate light, leaves turn slightly red. Grows slowly, suitable for combination with other plants.
Likes adequate light, has half shade tolerance, no apparent dormancy. Has red flowers sometimes.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color light green to gray white, with a great diurnal temperature range, with adequate sunlight turning to red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade, no apparent dormancy
maintenance.watering: Do not water frequently, keep a dry environment, water every 7-10 days
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
